capsules_submitted.utterance: I've always been a huge fan of Professor McGonagall. She's an amazing witch and an incredible role model for young witches everywhere. And let's not forget her bravery during the Battle of Hogwarts - she was one of the first to stand up against Voldemort and his followers.
